name: Trikumax Arena
description: Trikumax™ Arena is the next installment in the Trikumax™ video game series that was originally introduced in 2019 from Gestmorph Games and based on characters and stories created by Doryan Nelson. These two creators are back to bring you a brand new adventure where you'll help Gaea fight her way through a team of killer mechs after being trapped in a VR simulated slug fest! You'll have a literal knock out experience playing this game as it shows what can happen when you pit a fighting game character against shoot 'em up bosses!
